name: Ruby
text:
Ruby
Ruby was a patron at the Roadhouse in Twin Peaks, Washington.
Biography
While The Veils performed on stage, Ruby sat alone at a booth while two heavyset men approached. She said she was waiting for someone, but they wordlessly lifted her out of her seat and onto the floor. Ruby slowly began crawling into the nearby crowd of people, growing distraught. As the band finished playing, she began screaming uncontrollably.
